languages.text: Бунтовщики обзавелись загадочным оружием, истощающим силы навигаторов. Если хранитель станции даст им бой, то сразу погибнет. Фелек просит Вольного Торговца о последней услуге — подняться в покои госпожи, передать ей оберег и разобраться с предателями огнем и мечом. А затем привести Леди Кассию вниз, к своим людям.

traits.locale_text: Бунтовщики обзавелись загадочным оружием, истощающим силы Навигаторов. Если хранитель станции даст им бой, то сразу погибнет. Фелек просит Вольного Торговца о последней услуге — подняться в покои госпожи и разобраться с предателями огнем и мечом, а затем привести Леди Кассию к нему.

languages.text: The rebels have acquired mysterious weapons imbued with the powers of Navigators. The Keeper of the Station will immediately perish if he tries to fight them. Felek has asked the Rogue Trader to grant him one last request: to ascend to the mistress's chambers, give her the charm, and bring the traitors to justice. After that, Lady Cassia must be returned to her people on the lower level.
languages.original_text: Бунтовщики обзавелись загадочным оружием, истощающим силы навигаторов. Если хранитель станции даст им бой, то сразу погибнет. Фелек просит Вольного Торговца о последней услуге — подняться в покои госпожи, передать ей оберег и разобраться с предателями огнем и мечом. А затем привести Леди Кассию вниз, к своим людям.

traits.locale_text: The rebels have got mysterious weapons imbued with the powers of Navigators. The Keeper of the Station will immediately perish if he tries to fight them. Felek asked the Rogue Trader to grant him one last request: to ascend to the mistress's chambers, give her the charm, and bring the traitors to justice. After that, Lady Cassia must be returned back to her people on the lower level.

The rebels have acquired mysterious weapons imbued with the powers of Navigators. The Keeper of the Station will immediately perish if he tries to fight them. Felek has asked the Rogue Trader to grant him one last request: to ascend to the mistress's chambers, give her the charm, and bring the traitors to justice. After that, Lady Cassia must be returned to her people on the lower level.

The rebels have acquired mysterious weapons imbued with the powers of Navigators. The Keeper of the Station will immediately perish if he tries to fight them. Felek has asked the Rogue Trader to grant him one last request: to ascend to the mistress's chambers, give her the charm, and bring the traitors to justice. After that, Lady Cassia must be returned to her people on the lower level.

languages.text: Die Rebellen haben geheimnisvolle Waffen in ihrem Besitz, die mit Navigator-Kräften ausgestattet sind. Der Hüter der Station wird sofort untergehen, wenn er versucht, sie zu bekämpfen. Felek hat {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} um einen letzten Gefallen gebeten: in die Kammern der Herrin zu fahren, ihr den Zauber zu geben und die Verräter der Gerechtigkeit zuzuführen. Anschließend muss Lady Cassia zu ihren Leuten auf der unteren Ebene zurückgebracht werden.
languages.original_text: The rebels have acquired mysterious weapons imbued with the powers of Navigators. The Keeper of the Station will immediately perish if he tries to fight them. Felek has asked the Rogue Trader to grant him one last request: to ascend to the mistress's chambers, give her the charm, and bring the traitors to justice. After that, Lady Cassia must be returned to her people on the lower level.

traits.locale_text: Die Rebellen haben geheimnisvolle Waffen in ihrem Besitz, die mit Navigator-Kräften ausgestattet sind. Der Hüter der Station wird sofort untergehen, wenn er versucht, sie zu bekämpfen. Felek hat {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} um einen letzten Gefallen gebeten: in die Kammern der Herrin zu fahren, ihr den Zauber zu geben und die Verräter der Gerechtigkeit zuzuführen. Anschließend muss Lady Cassia zu ihren Leuten auf der unteren Ebene zurückgebracht werden.

languages.text: Les rebelles ont obtenu de mystérieuses armes imprégnées des pouvoirs des navigateurs. Le gardien de la station ne survivra pas une seconde s'il essaie de les affronter. Felek a demandé une dernière chose {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} : il veut que {mf|ce dernier|cette dernière} monte jusqu'aux quartiers de sa maîtresse, lui donne l'amulette et remette les traîtres à la justice. Dame Cassia devra ensuite retrouver ses sujets au niveau inférieur.
languages.original_text: The rebels have acquired mysterious weapons imbued with the powers of Navigators. The Keeper of the Station will immediately perish if he tries to fight them. Felek has asked the Rogue Trader to grant him one last request: to ascend to the mistress's chambers, give her the charm, and bring the traitors to justice. After that, Lady Cassia must be returned to her people on the lower level.

traits.locale_text: Les rebelles ont obtenu de mystérieuses armes imprégnées des pouvoirs des navigateurs. Le gardien de la station ne survivra pas une seconde s'il essaie de les affronter. Felek a demandé une dernière chose {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} : il veut que {mf|ce dernier|cette dernière} monte jusqu'aux quartiers de sa maîtresse, lui donne l'amulette et remette les traîtres à la justice. Dame Cassia devra ensuite retrouver ses sujets au niveau inférieur.

languages.text: 叛乱分子得到了神秘的武器。这种武器蕴含导航者的力量，如果星站的守护者打算与叛军正面冲突，恐怕会被叛军的武器立刻杀害。费费雷克恳求行商浪人答应他最后一个请求：前往女主人的房间，将护身符带给她，并将那群叛徒绳之以法。在这之后，行商浪人需要把卡西娅女士带到下层房间的守卫身边。
languages.original_text: The rebels have acquired mysterious weapons imbued with the powers of Navigators. The Keeper of the Station will immediately perish if he tries to fight them. Felek has asked the Rogue Trader to grant him one last request: to ascend to the mistress's chambers, give her the charm, and bring the traitors to justice. After that, Lady Cassia must be returned to her people on the lower level.

traits.locale_text: 叛乱分子得到了神秘的武器。这种武器蕴含导航者的力量，如果星站的守护者打算与叛军正面冲突，恐怕会被叛军的武器立刻杀害。费费雷克恳求行商浪人答应他最后一个请求：前往女主人的房间，将护身符带给她，并将那群叛徒绳之以法。在这之后，行商浪人需要把卡西娅女士带到下层房间的守卫身边。

languages.text: 反乱軍は航宙士の能力が込められた謎の武器を手に入れた。彼らと戦おうとすれば、ステーションの管理者はたちまちやられてしまうだろう。フェレックは自由開拓者に最後の頼みを聞いてほしいと頼んだ。それはミストレスの居室へ行き、チャームを与え、叛逆者たちを裁判にかけるというものであった。その後、レディ・カシアを下層階にいる彼女の民の元に戻さなければならない。
languages.original_text: The rebels have acquired mysterious weapons imbued with the powers of Navigators. The Keeper of the Station will immediately perish if he tries to fight them. Felek has asked the Rogue Trader to grant him one last request: to ascend to the mistress's chambers, give her the charm, and bring the traitors to justice. After that, Lady Cassia must be returned to her people on the lower level.

traits.locale_text: 反乱軍は航宙士の能力が込められた謎の武器を手に入れた。彼らと戦おうとすれば、ステーションの管理者はたちまちやられてしまうだろう。フェレックは自由開拓者に最後の頼みを聞いてほしいと頼んだ。それはミストレスの居室へ行き、チャームを与え、叛逆者たちを裁判にかけるというものであった。その後、レディ・カシアを下層階にいる彼女の民の元に戻さなければならない。

languages.text: Los rebeldes han conseguido armas misteriosas imbuidas del poder de los navegantes. El guardián del a estación moriría al momento si intentara hacerles frente. Felek pide un último favor a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente: que suba a los aposentos de la señora, le dé el amuleto y ajusticie a los traidores. Después, lady Cassia debe volver a su gente en el nivel inferior.
languages.original_text: The rebels have acquired mysterious weapons imbued with the powers of Navigators. The Keeper of the Station will immediately perish if he tries to fight them. Felek has asked the Rogue Trader to grant him one last request: to ascend to the mistress's chambers, give her the charm, and bring the traitors to justice. After that, Lady Cassia must be returned to her people on the lower level.

traits.locale_text: Los rebeldes han conseguido armas misteriosas imbuidas del poder de los navegantes. El guardián del a estación moriría al momento si intentara hacerles frente. Felek pide un último favor a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente: que suba a los aposentos de la señora, le dé el amuleto y ajusticie a los traidores. Después, lady Cassia debe volver a su gente en el nivel inferior.

languages.text: İsyancılar, Rotacıların güçleriyle donatılan gizemli silahlar ele geçirmiş. İstasyon Sorumlusu, onlarla savaşmaya kalkarsa anında canından olur. Felek, Hür Tacir'den son bir ricada bulundu. Hanımın odasına çıkmanı, ona tılsımı vermeni ve hainleri adalete teslim etmeni istiyor. Ardından da Leydi Cassia'nın alt seviyedeki halkının yanına dönmesi gerekiyor.
languages.original_text: The rebels have acquired mysterious weapons imbued with the powers of Navigators. The Keeper of the Station will immediately perish if he tries to fight them. Felek has asked the Rogue Trader to grant him one last request: to ascend to the mistress's chambers, give her the charm, and bring the traitors to justice. After that, Lady Cassia must be returned to her people on the lower level.
